div.p: The way in which a person authenticated a composition
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-attestation-mode

tr.td: The person authenticated the content in their personal capacity.
The person authenticated the content in their professional capacity.
The person authenticated the content and accepted legal responsibility for its content.
The organization authenticated the content as consistent with their policies and procedures.
